text: you have power over your mind not outside events realize this and you will find strength
the obstacle is the path what stands in the way becomes the way
he who has a why to live can bear almost any how
man is not disturbed by events but by the view he takes of them
waste no more time arguing what a good man should be be one
true happiness is to enjoy the present without anxious dependence on the future
wealth consists not in having great possessions but in having few wants
difficulties strengthen the mind as labor strengthens the body
time is like a river made up of events as soon as a thing appears it is carried away
if you want to improve be content to be thought foolish and stupid
the happiness of your life depends upon the quality of your thoughts
no man is free who is not master of himself
first say to yourself what you would be and then do what you have to do
a gem cannot be polished without friction nor a man perfected without trials
to bear trials with a calm mind robs misfortune of its strength
courage is not the absence of fear but the triumph over it
the best revenge is not to be like your enemy
it is not things themselves that disturb us but our opinions about them
luck is what happens when preparation meets opportunity
we suffer more often in imagination than in reality
do not spoil what you have by desiring what you have not
dwell on the beauty of life watch the stars and see yourself running with them
to live is to suffer to survive is to find some meaning in the suffering
the soul becomes dyed with the color of its thoughts
silence is a source of great strength
what we do now echoes in eternity
no man has the power to have everything but it is in his power not to want everything
difficulties show men what they are
you become what you give your attention to
life is very short and anxious for those who forget the past neglect the present and fear the future
wealth is the slave of a wise man the master of a fool
we should always be asking ourselves is this something that is or is not in my control
do every act of your life as though it were the very last act of your life
do not pray for an easy life pray for the strength to endure a difficult one
he suffers more than necessary who suffers before it is necessary
to improve is to change to be perfect is to change often
the universe is change our life is what our thoughts make it
life without design is erratic
nothing endures but change
choose not to be harmed and you will not feel harmed
the greatest wealth is to live content with little
to be calm is the highest achievement of the self
our life is what our thoughts make it
the mind that is anxious about future events is miserable
wealth unused might as well not exist
the world turns aside to let any man pass who knows where he is going
he conquers who endures
poverty is not having too little it is wanting more
do not stumble on something behind you
if it is not right do not do it if it is not true do not say it
a man who fears suffering is already suffering from what he fears
wealth and freedom are achieved by dismissing unnecessary desires
expectation is the root of all heartache
it is not the man who has too little but the man who craves more who is poor
the wise man is self sufficient and cannot be driven into exile
better to trip with the feet than with the tongue
life is long if you know how to use it
fortune falls heavily on those for whom she is unexpected
the greatest remedy for anger is delay
you act like mortals in all that you fear and like immortals in all that you desire
he who opens a school door closes a prison
kindness in words creates confidence kindness in thinking creates profoundness kindness in giving creates love
the more you know yourself the more clarity there is
knowing yourself is the beginning of all wisdom
a wise man will make more opportunities than he finds
we are what we repeatedly do excellence then is not an act but a habit
fall seven times and stand up eight
be tolerant with others and strict with yourself
he who fears death will never do anything worthy of a living man
it is more necessary for the soul to be cured than the body
associate with those who will make a better man of you
what man actually needs is not a tensionless state but rather the striving and struggling for some goal worthy of him
no man was ever wise by chance
man conquers the world by conquering himself
sometimes even to live is an act of courage
dare to be wise
life is not about finding yourself life is about creating yourself
to live happily is an inward power of the soul
we are always complaining that our days are few and acting as though there would be no end of them
a person who is not master of himself is his own slave
time is the most valuable thing a man can spend
begin at once to live and count each separate day as a separate life
no man is crushed by misfortune unless he has first been deceived by prosperity
man conquers the world by conquering his mind
the art of living is more like wrestling than dancing
it is not length of life but depth of life that matters
great minds discuss ideas average minds discuss events small minds discuss people
to love is to live
the man who has anticipated the coming of troubles takes away their power when they arrive
the things you think about determine the quality of your mind
not life but good life is to be chiefly valued
to seek tranquility prepare for turmoil
to live a good life we have the potential for it if we learn to be indifferent to what makes no difference
man is affected not by events but by the view he takes of them
happiness depends upon ourselves
discipline is destiny
the wise man is content with his lot whatever it may be
life is only as good as your mindset
no great thing is created suddenly
let reason govern desire
you cannot step twice into the same river
control your mind or it will control you
the mind is everything what you think you become
you cannot escape the responsibility of tomorrow by evading it today
a man is not finished when he is defeated he is finished when he quits
strength does not come from winning your struggles develop your strengths
